name: P_C_PRIMITIVE_OBJECT
documentation: Parent of types representing constraints on primitive types.

assumed_value.name: assumed_value
assumed_value.documentation: Value to be assumed if none sent in data.

is_enumerated_type_constraint.name: is_enumerated_type_constraint
is_enumerated_type_constraint.documentation: True if this constraint is actually of an enumerated type that conforms to a primitive type, not a primitive.

constraint.name: constraint
constraint.documentation: Constraint represented by this object; redefine in descendants.
